Coral Ridge Yacht Club | Fort Lauderdale Venue | PartySlate Skip to content Venues Planners Vendors Ideas Venues Planners Vendors Ideas Coral Ridge Yacht Club Find Venues / Florida / Fort Lauderdale / Coral Ridge Yacht Club Unclaimed Coral Ridge Yacht Club 2800 Yacht Club Blvd, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33304, USA Max Seated 125 Max Standing 325 Request info Favorite Owner hasn't claimed this business If you own this business, claim your profile to update information, add photos, and more. Claim Profile Overview Gallery 1 About Coral Ridge Yacht Club The Club hosts a wide-variety of private events each year including weddings, birthdays, business gatherings, holiday parties, family gatherings, and more offering exquisite views of the Intracoastal Waterway, our Marina, and our charming courtyard.

The Club offers our guests 4 different event spaces, each showcasing a different ambiance, from casual outdoor dining venues to indoor Clubhouse rooms, illuminating elegance and charm. From beginning to end, our Catering and Special Events Director and Executive Chef will work with you to bring your vision of the perfect party to life, and ensure that your event is a great success.

The Commodores Lounge:
The Commodores Lounge, a more intimate dining venue, has a view of our beautiful courtyard and fountain area. The ambiance of the room is perfect for daytime and evening events, and can host approx. 60 people.

Point Bar & Grille:
Casual gatherings at the Point Bar & Grille can include barbecues, lawn games, children's parties, and even daytime wedding ceremonies. The Point Bar's island design with native landscaping, on the Intracoastal Waterway, is the perfect outdoor setting for both day and evening events.

Intracoastal Room & Verandah:
The luxury of the Intracoastal Room is unsurpassed for hosting a large scale event and holds approximately 200 guests. With an amazing view overlooking the Intracoastal Waterway, fabulous yachts, and Birch State Park, the Intracoastal Room exudes old Florida charm.
The attached covered Verandah is an exquisite location to host the party of your dreams and holds up to 125 guests.

The Patio:
The Patio, with its gorgeous, panoramic views of the Club's Olympic-size pool, Marina and the Intracoastal Waterway, is a perfect location for any intimate outdoor gathering and holds approx. 30 guests.The Patio is effortlessly romantic, whether soaking up the sun or enjoying the majestic Florida evening sunsets.

Located along Florida's famed Gold Coast on the Intracoastal Waterway, for over 70 years the Coral Ridge Yacht Club has beckoned to those who love the water, enjoy socializing and living life to the fullest. Established in 1947, the Coral Ridge Yacht Club mingles tradition and old-world elegance with fun, friendships and family.

Offering exceptional cuisine and service in a family-friendly atmosphere, why not take time and explore all that CRYC has to offer.
